title: Kropp Typ Kalkylator
metaDescription: Gratis body type calculator - Discover if you are an ectomorph, mesomorph, or endomorph baserat på your body measurements. Know your somatotype.

form.title: Ange your measurements
form.wristPlaceholder: Measure your wrist at the narrowest point
form.wristHint: Measure at the narrowest point, just above the wrist bone
form.anklePlaceholder: Measure your ankle at the narrowest point
form.ankleHint: Measure at the narrowest point, just above the ankle bone

info.title: Om Kropp Types
info.description: Somatotypes or body types were developed by psychologist William Sheldon in the 1940s. This classification divides body types into three main categories baserat på skeletal structure and body composition.

ectomorph.name: Ectomorph
ectomorph.description: Ectomorphs have a lean body with long limbs, fast metabolism, and difficulty gaining weight or muscle mass. They typically have narrow shoulders and low body fat.

mesomorph.name: Mesomorph
mesomorph.description: Mesomorphs have a naturally athletic build with broad shoulders, narrow waist, and ease in gaining muscle. They have an efficient metabolism and respond well to training.

endomorph.name: Endomorph
endomorph.description: Endomorphs have a larger bone structure, rounded body shape, and tendency to store fat. They have a slower metabolism and gain weight easily, but can also build muscle.

info.limitations: This calculator provides a general estimate baserat på skeletal measurements. Most people are a combination of body types. Resultat should be used as a general guide and not as a medical diagnosis.
